description:
A 6-week video-driven youth evangelism curriculum that not only teaches but gives real-life examples on how to apply the principles taught in this course.

The goal of these lessons is to help middle and high school students sink their roots down deep into God's Word, to help them grow and go.

Youth will learn about:

  • A biblical worldview
  • Fascinating history about each country
  • Key apologetics
  • How to share their faith whether one-to-one or open-air. Watching these examples of witnessing will inspire them to have the boldness to publicly preach the gospel in their part of the world.

This course consists of:

  • Six half-hour episodes of 6 different countries from "The Way of the Master," Season 4: Europe--including brand-new footage
  • Printable youth ministry small group discussion guides & homeschool quizzes
  • Supplemental tract, bible, and news resources
  • A Bonus Video: "The Science of Evolution" (30 min.)

Also includes special interviews with the Duggar family, from TLC's "19 Kids & Counting"... A must see.
title: Roots - Youth Evangelism Bible Study
